x-apideck-consumer-id.description: ID of the consumer which you want to get or push data from

x-apideck-app-id.description: The ID of your Unify application

service_id.description: Service ID of the resource to return

target_field_id.description: ID of the target field to return as a custom mapping.

$ul: **data**
**consumer_id**: Consumer ID
**custom_field**: This mapping represents a finder for a custom field
**description**: Target Field description
**id**: Target Field ID
**key**: Target Field Key
**label**: Target Field name to use as a label
**required**: Target Field Mapping is required
**value**: Target Field Mapping value
**status**: HTTP Response Status
**status_code**: HTTP Response Status Code

**error**: Contains an explanation of the status_code as defined in HTTP/1.1 standard (RFC 7231)
**message**: A human-readable message providing more details about the error.
